Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: Holistically, teacher is able to point out a wider range of subject-specific feedback while GenAI is more used to point out weaknesses in writing

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: There is little-no connection when looking at feedback from GenAI, however it was concise and clear, while teacher feedback , while engaging, would have a chance of being vague, unclear or confusing.
